title: Ford Lost Money in the Third Quarter as Costs Surged
description: The automaker is struggling with supply chain problems and wrote off its investment in a self-driving technology business.
dc:creator: Neal E. Boudette
media:credit: Sylvia Jarrus for The New York Times
media:description: Ford said it shipped 1.1 million cars and light trucks in the third quarter, compared with just over one million in the same period last year.
